text: Magnus Hart (; born 20 April 1996) is a Chinese-born, Norwegian footballer who plays as a midfielder for Råde IL. ==Club career== Hart signed his first professional contract with Tippeligaen side Sarpsborg 08 in 2016, having made two substitute appearances for the Sarpsborg-based club the previous season. He signed for 2.
